titles: Disputatio inter clericum et miletem super potestate prelatis ecclesiæ atq[us] principibus terrarum commissa sub forma dialogi
author: William, of Ockham, ca. 1285-ca. 1349, attributed name.
Dubois, Pierre, fl. 1300, attributed name.
notes: Variously attributed to William of Ockham and Pierre Dubois.
Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Title page is in the same setting as STC 12510--STC.
Identified as STC 12510 on UMI microfilm reel 102.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Church and state --  Early works to 1800.
